question: There are 100 students in 3 sections A, B and C of a class. The average marks of all the three sections was 84. The average of B and C was 87.5 and the average marks of students in A section was :
explanation:
Numbers of students in section A = x
∴ Numbers of students in section B and C = (100 - x)
∴ x $latex \\times$ 70 + (100 - x) $latex \\times$ 87.5 = 84 $latex \\times$ 100
=> 70x + 87.5 $latex \\times$ 100 - 87.5x = 8400
=> 8750 - 17.5x = 8400
=> 17.5x = 8750 - 8400
$latex => x = \\frac{350}{17.5} = 20&s=1$
Hence option [A] is correct answer.
